We are number one in architect field

For their 150 year anniversary, Fritz Hansen will participate in this year's 3daysofdesign in Copenhagen and have joined forces with Henning Larsen to design a pavilion. Designed with a Nordic appr around daylight and honest materials,the pavilion is designed to be taken down and repurposed forces with Henning Larsen to design a pavilion.
